RACE WITH THE DEVIL

...If you\\\'re going to race with THE DEVIL,you\\\'ve got to be as FAST AS HELL...

(1975/Renewed 2003 - 88 minutes)

Features: 
Produced by Wes Bishop. Written by Lee Frost and Wes Bishop. Exec. Producer Paul Maslansky. Directed by Jack Starret. Music by Leonard Roseman.

Starring:
Peter Fonda, Warren Oates, Loretta Swit, Lara Parker.
Handling:
For old friends Roger (Peter Fonda) and Frank (Warren Oates) and their wifes (Lara Parker from DARK SHADOWS and Loretta Swit from M*A*S*H), it was supposed to be \\\"the best damn vacation they ever had.\\\" But their RV road trip takes a deadly detour at a secluded campsite when they accidentally witness a Satanic orgy and brutal human sacrifice.
Now horror hits highway as the couples are chased by blood-crazed cultists through some of the most intense crash-and-burn mayhem of the decade and into one of the greatest twist endings in drive-in history!!

R.G. Armstrong (PREDATOR, CHILDREN OF THE CORN)- and a reported real-life cult of Satanists- co-star in this horror/action smash directed by Tarrantino-favorite Jack Starret (THE LOSERS, CLEOPATRA JONES, SLAUGHTER) and now packed with explosive new Extras !!

\\\"A CULT FAVORITE WITH CAR CHASE THRILLS AND SKIN-CRAWLING SCARES!!\\\" 
-ALL MOVIE GUIDE-
